Name: Brainstorm
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
STRAIN into ice-filled glass (preferably over a large cube or chunk of block ice).
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Dry vermouth balances the sweet notes of Bénédictine over a spirituous Irish whiskey base.
History: Adapted from a recipe in Hugo R. Ensslin's 1917 Recipes for Mixed Drinks (2nd Edition) .
Nutrition: One serving of Brainstorm contains 167 calories
